author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Biofrontera AG Says Intends To Offer ADS In Registered U.S. Offering Following A Listing On Nasdaq Capital Markets
text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Biofrontera AG:
* PTA-ADHOC: BIOFRONTERA AG: INTENTION TO OFFER AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES IN REGISTERED U.S. OFFERING FOLLOWING A LISTING ON NASDAQ CAPITAL MARKETS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ( Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com )
